mdRecord.dcterms:title: VA Association of Fire Chiefs Tentative Convention Program And Memorandums Concerning the Convention, July 19, 1954
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Memorandums written on July 19, 1954, concerning the VA Association of Fire Chiefs' 24th annual convention, with the first one including an enclosed program and the second one regarding committee nominations.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
